title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. I, pt. 73 - Asbestos Safety Program Requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. I, pt. 73 - Asbestos Safety Program Requirements

State Regulations
§ 73.1 - Definitions
§ 73.2 - Administrative requirements and practices for asbestos safety training providers
§ 73.3 - Application information
§ 73.4 - Minimum instructor qualifications
§ 73.5 - Topics and requirements for initial asbestos safety training programs
§ 73.6 - Topics and requirements for annual refresher asbestos safety training programs
§ 73.7 - Required examination
§ 73.8 - Accreditation of asbestos safety training providers
§ 73.9 - Revocation, suspension and modification of accredited training programs
§ 73.10 - Equivalence of prior training
§ 73.11 - Severability
§ 73.12 to 73.18 - Repealed
§ 73.19 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. I, pt. 73

Statutory authority: Labor Law, §905

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
